heroSection.title: Welcome to muwatana
heroSection.description: Learn how to stay safe online, spot fake news, balance screen time, guide children in the digital world

learningCenter.title: Cybersecurity & Privacy
learningCenter.description: Stay safe online by learning practical tips to protect your personal information and avoid digital threats.

learningCenter.title: Parenting in the Digital Age
learningCenter.description: Discover how to identify fake news, navigate online content responsibly, and develop critical thinking skills for the digital age.

learningCenter.title: Digital Health
learningCenter.description: Promote well-being in the digital world by managing screen time, maintaining healthy online habits, and balancing technology use.

learningCenter.title: Media Literacy
learningCenter.description: Discover how to identify fake news, navigate online content responsibly, and develop critical thinking skills for the digital age.

digitalJourneys.title: Digital Journeys
digitalJourneys.description: Discuss and reflect on digital journeys with your spouse, children, and students.

digitalCitizenship.title: Discover Digital Citizenship
digitalCitizenship.description: In today's world, we all need the skill of a good digital citizenship to be safe and productive online. There are 9 digital citizenship principles.

popularTopics.title: Setting up 2-Factor Authentication

popularTopics.title: Setting up Parental Controls
popularTopics.description: Take control of what your child can do on their device

popularTopics.title: Cyberattacks
popularTopics.description: What is a cyberattack and how can you avoid them.
